## Loading dependency and targets

```{r dependencies}
library(targets)
library(lavaan)
library(semTools)

cfa_model_MZexclude <- tar_read(cfa_model_MZexclude)
metric_model_MZexclude <- tar_read(metric_model_MZexclude)
```

## CFA summary

```{r cfa}
summary(cfa_model_MZexclude, fit.measures = TRUE, standardized = TRUE)
```

## Constrained CFA summary

```{r cfa_constrained}
summary(metric_model_MZexclude, fit.measures = TRUE, standardized = TRUE)
``` 

## Comparison between constrained and unconstrained models

```{r metric}
summary(compareFit(metric_model_MZexclude, cfa_model_MZexclude))
```
